title: quarkus create -S 2.5 fails if registry.quarkus.redhat.com is first

labels.name: area/devtools
labels.description: Issues/PR related to maven, gradle, platform and cli tooling/plugins

body:
### Describe the bug

I have quarkus.redhat.com and quarkus.io listed:
```
quarkus registry list
Configured Quarkus extension registries:
playground.io (disabled)
registry.quarkus.redhat.com
registry.quarkus.io
(Read from /Users/max/.quarkus/config.yaml)
```

but running create using -S 2.5 (latest recommend community) fails:

```
quarkus create -S 2.5
Creating an app (default project type, see --help).
[ERROR] ‚ùó  Unable to create project: Failed to locate stream 2.5 in platform(s): com.redhat.quarkus.platform, io.quarkus.platform
```

If I run `quarkus registry remove registry.quarkus.redhat.com` then `quarkus create -S 2.5` starts working 

### Expected behavior

should generate for stream 2.5 as found in the registry.quarkus.io registry.

Or at least state which platforms was searched so user can understand why it was rejected/not found.

### Actual behavior

just says it cannot find 2.5 even though it is there.

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_
